thread.title: Home away from home
thread.title_full: Home away from home - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: annatpoplargrove
title: Home away from home
text:
Spent six nights in March and loved it! Had a cozy petite room and it was plenty room --definitely a cozy space to come home to when you've been out on the town. The staff is so helpful and responds to every request. Great concierge service for restaurants. Wonderful to have the wine and cheese 'happy hour' and continental breakfast is sufficient. Having Tony's di Napoli next door and for room service was delightful. Hard to believe this boutique hotel is steps from Times Square--so quiet and yet right in the middle of the action. Hope I get to enjoy it again!
Room Tip: I was on 3rd floor, room 311. Near elevator but very quiet and just one floor away from Rick's... See more room tips
